description: The file defines SplashActivity, an Android activity used as a splash screen. It displays a centered 'HelloTV' text, waits for approximately 1.5 seconds, then navigates to MainActivity. It enforces focus for TV D-pad navigation and blocks back button presses during the splash.

classes.name: SplashActivity
classes.description: An Android FragmentActivity that acts as a splash screen, displays a greeting, and then navigates to the main application.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the splash screen view, sets focus on the title text, and schedules navigation to MainActivity after a delay.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Removes any pending navigation callbacks when the activity is destroyed to prevent memory leaks.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events; provides feedback on D-pad/Enter presses and blocks the back button during splash display.
